      • roundUpPositive

        public static int roundUpPositive(double d)
        Parameters:
        d - Number to round up
        Returns:
        The number passed as parameter rounded up if it is positive. Returns 0 if it is negative.

      • roundUpPositiveWithMax

        public static int roundUpPositiveWithMax(double d,
                                         int max)
        Parameters:
        d - Number to round up
        max - Upper limit
        Returns:
        max if the number passed as parameter exceeds the maximum while it returns 0 if it is negative. If d > 0 and d <= max then the number is rounded up and returned.
        See Also:
        roundUpPositive(double)
